name: Full Stack E-Commerce Website
about: This project serves as a testament to my proficiency in utilizing modern web development technologies like Next.js 13, Tailwind CSS, Strapi CMS, and Redux to create high-performance, feature-rich e-commerce applications that meet the demands of today's digital landscape.

name: Music Streaming Application
about: The Musica Application is a sleek, high-performance music streaming app built using the latest web technologies: React.js for the frontend framework, Vite for blazing-fast build tool and development environment, and Tailwind CSS for modern, utility-first styling.

name: Moviex
about: Moviex - It is froentend application which makes user to select movie.

name: Christmas-Wishes
about: Christmas Wishes - It helps user to create a christmas wishing card of their like and share it to their friends and family
